tweet.text: Looks like you made the nice list this year: our new search interface allows you to search and sort #FRUS documents by date, keyword, and volume. Happy holidays! https://t.co/1ECc9ulUnu https://t.co/Uc1Yf413xf
tweet.html: Looks like you made the nice list this year: our new search interface allows you to search and sort #FRUS documents by date, keyword, and volume. Happy holidays! history.state.gov/search pic.twitter.com/Uc1Yf413xf
